summary: Retexture of the scimitar in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Rune Scimitar is now in Skyrim! It\'s a retexture of the original scimitar from the game.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Tired of the original Skyrim theme menu song? Try this mod: [url=26832]Skyrim Dovahkiin Techno Remix[/url]
author: Zxeddery
